title: How to Make a Microwave Muffin in a Mug

steps.headline: Add the sugar, flour, milk and cooking oil together in a large mug and mix together well.
steps.description: Make sure you thoroughly mix it as the end result may taste a bit off if you don't.

steps.headline: Add the cocoa powder to the mug and mix again.
steps.description: It may take a while to mix it. Make sure you mix gently to avoid powder flying out of the mug.

steps.headline: Add your chocolate chips to the mug and stir around until well combined.
Beat the egg gently with a fork.
Add the beaten egg to the mug and mix thoroughly.
steps.description: It's very important that you mix thoroughly because if the egg is not completely combined, the muffin will taste gross and eggy.

steps.headline: Microwave for 3 minutes.
steps.description: Check the mug after cooking and decide whether you should put it back in the microwave or not. Not every microwave cooks the same way.

steps.headline: Serve or consume your muffin straight away.
steps.description: You can either eat it in the cup or tip it out in a bowl or on a plate. The muffin will not keep so don't store it away.
